body: Second panel is kinda a mess and I can't format it well, but i think it's with the mc

First page by Google translate decree:
First half panel: Chengcheng classmate... at school... don't do this kind of thing... let's have a serious relationship... 
Second half panel(bottom) : yesterday's date really made me very happy. I can't help it. Let's do it now. I like you even more in class.  I can't concentrate well... Okay, I know
I really want to know what the 2 pages say
